author: cornl
title: Cardano Center Poland web & socials
description: Cryptocurrencies become more and more popular in Poland. How do we enable and encourage Polish citizen to get to know the Cardano ecosystem?
solution: We want to build a Polish Cardano Center where people find valuable data, learn about Cardano's possibilities and exchange their ideas
experience:
- 4-yr-experienced blockchain translator & BeInCrypto.pl writer/editor
- podcaster, YT, entrepreneur
- support of 2 SPOs & developers
